name: Move identity box to the right (FX 50+)
description: Moves the Firefox identity box and it's permission/action icons to the right.

user.name: tulirebane
user.about: I no longer update my UI styles in this site, please check out my GitLab repo for the newest stuff!

additional_info:
Goes well with:
  • style 92775
    • (disable hover feature)
  • style 138269
  • style 137956
Changelog: 03.09.17: Removed setting, commented option out 12.05.17: Added an option to flip icons 22.04.17: Removed old code and options 21.01.17: Fixed autocomplete again, didn't seem to work persistently last time 08.01.17: Fixed autocomplete, thanks Jo√£o! 07.01.17: Some fixes and code cleanup for 50.0.1 09.08.16: Updated for 48.0b1 22.11:15: Initial version based on style 69648 Tags: address bar addressbar location bar locationbar awesome bar awesomebar url bar urlbar omnibar omnibox site info icon secure insecure unsecure non-secure
